backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no defined methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI/animation features to source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and effects of key frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining color tokens, CSS variables, and dark‑mode variants for the app shell.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML document bootstrapping the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling invitation flow, puppy mood logic, moving NO button behavior, gradients, confetti, sparkles, and background animations.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHeartsBa: Renders randomized floating heart icons in a fixed background for subtle animated ambiance.
frontend/src/components/SparklePop.tsx: Creates an 8‑element radial sparkle burst animation centered around the puppy.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and updates a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and manages query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handles login/logout, identity persistence, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles including Quicksand font, theme tokens, dark mode, and custom animation utilities like fade‑in and text slide‑in.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entrypoint that mounts the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, content scanning, custom colors, animations, fonts, and container settings using several plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the Valentine SPA’s features, requirements, transitions, animations, and UI behavior rules.
